quotes.quote: If I always did what I was qualified to do I’d be pushing a broom some where.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: The definition of a gentleman is to make people in an uncomfortable position comfortable.
quotes.author: Harvey Summers

quotes.quote: Comparison is the thief of joy.
quotes.author: President Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Specialise in being you.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: A scheme of which every part promises delight, can never be successful.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Happiness = Reality - Expectations
quotes.author: Tom Magliozzi

quotes.quote: Hate is poison that kills the vessel it sits in.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A mind is a terrible thing to waste.
quotes.author: UNCF

quotes.quote: Things only hurt when there's some truth to it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Find people that don’t need work to be around.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: The goal is not to run a marathon the goal is to become a runner.
quotes.author: Atomic Habits

quotes.quote: Good artists copy, great artists steal!
quotes.author: Picasso

quotes.quote: Try to learn something about everything and everything about something.
quotes.author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.quote: Life is a single player game.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: You are the average of the five people you most associate with.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Anxiety is a symptom of self disunity.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If your looking for a lover - dont judge a book by its cover!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: To maintain your freedom, don't upgrade your lifestyle all the time. If you make a little bit of extra money, keep living like your old self.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Special people get special results / play stupid games win stupid prices.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Escape competition through authenticity.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Impatience with action, patience with results.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: If you don’t want to work with someone your entire life don’t work with them a single day.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Do not attribute to mallice that what can be explained through incompetence.
quotes.author: Hanlon's Razor

quotes.quote: Think only of the past as its remembrance gives you pleasure.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: When you're in a hole, stop digging.
quotes.author: Denis Healey

quotes.quote: I wouldn't want to belong to a club that would have me as a member.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx
